title: Champ Riven to come back during the 2015 worlds.
body:
Is this actually happening? because if so i really dont want it to.

I mean the worth of that skin would go down the drain, no one would go "Oh awesome he has championship riven" i mean i played during the 2012 year, but i stopped for a while. even tho i really want the skin i would rather it not become available in the market. its so stupid that this is even a thing. i mean why make that skin available it will take away all its value :<  ohwell i guess its their decision in the end, ALSO in regards to champ thresh is that also coming out again? i would like to think not aswell :/ i think all the championship skins should be LIMITED only. i mean i do feel sorry for the people that joined later but sorry you missed out :/

replies.body:
you can get champ riven if you get all picks right in this years pick 'em challenge. note, only 10 people got all the picks right last year.
http://pickem.na.lolesports.com/en-US
Riot said at one point there's a possible chance of it coming back next year and releasing a Championship Bundle along with the next Championship skin  but we don't know yet.

Whats the use of having a high value skin that no one can buy?

if you can never buy it then it has no value. 
and if it has no value technically its worthless, and who benefits from a worthless skin?
I don't, RIOT doesn't, you don't. 

if you have a skin that is only released occasionally, then it is high value because everyone wants it and will pay absolutely any price when it comes out. but if no one can ever buy it, no one will ever pay any money and it therefore is worthless.

like the crown jewels for example, sure they are 'worth' a lot in theory, but because they can never be bought or sold or even used, they are technically worthless. the one person who owns them can sit back and think "yes, i have this" and thats all.. what good does that do?

think victorious jarvan/janna those skins are almost never seen, and will only get rarer and rarer and rarer until eventually in a few years time, everyone who had them will no longer be playing lol and they wont exist anymore.

why should this happen? people put effort into making skins and people enjoy using them and seeing them, whats the use of having skins coded into the game that are never and will never be seen? thats pointless. do you want the riven skin to be the same? 
(you gotta admit that even though i hate riven in every shape and form that its a bloody awesome skin) it would be a shame if it disappeared entirely, you already don't see it much, maybe once every 300 games at best.

so i do think that all skins should be purchasable.

I doubt it will happen, riot hiphopapottamus (not real name but hip is in it) has said it's likely to come back at some stage but most likely won't be during this worlds. Something like limited skins came available after 4 or 5 years so c riven is likely to be in that time frame

Also thresh was legacy only and they clearly stated that at time of his release
